website_summaries.verdict: A very affordable way to keep up to 4 guns out of the wrong hands.
pros: Good basic unit, well made, with substantial deadbolts
Rapid digital keypad access with emergency override
Easy to mount with fitting kit supplied
Shelf for handguns, ammo, or other small valuables
cons: Will not accept some long guns

customer_reviews.title: Electronic mechanism failed but support sent a replacement locker
customer_reviews.text: Update: Support sent me a new locker and I don't need to return the defective unit. I will update this review again after a few weeks of use. I really wanted to like this locker but the product has been faulty and support won't allow me to return it but instead they will send me a new electronic assembly that I need to install myself. I have waited almost 3 months for this piece and will fall well outside of the return window if the replacement fails. Support wouldn't even do a full unit replacement for me..
customer_reviews.author: GZ

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. Does the job. I had to open the been panel and fix the locking mechanism when it arrived so if you're comfortable doing that your self is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: gun case
customer_reviews.text: easy to use fits 5 rifles, inside box a little small for a full size case and gun, gun fits in box fine even with ammo, great value for the money may have to buy a larger on if I expand
customer_reviews.author: Edwin J. Deutsch

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Safe is actually too small to hold a shotgun with barrel intact. Safe has 4 holes for mounting to wall and 2 holes for floor but only came with 2 bolts for mounting. Setting up password was easy! Waste of money if u wanna secure long guns.
customer_reviews.author: devaughn major

customer_reviews.title: Cannot Beat For Price
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction. Not a "safe" but much more sturdy metal paneling and locking mechanism than comparable Stack-on rifle cabinets. Only drawback is that it really only fits a couple of rifles comfortably if they are equipped with additional accessories (e.g. scope, etc.).
customer_reviews.author: none

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was super fast (earlier than expected) and packaged very well. Easy to setup and sturdy for light safe duty. More than enough room for my needs. Note: if you have safe on carpet, when door is open it will tip so either add weights to bottom of safe or secure to wall. For the money, think this is more than sufficient and would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ManuFit4Life

customer_reviews.title: Broken into under 2 min.
customer_reviews.text: This company is a scam , after sent a defect safe that didnt open i had a friend who breaks into safes open this up with a screw driver abs a crowbar under 2 min. Buy American from a brick n mortar store. Its your guns ... don't risk it.
customer_reviews.author: Joezombi74

customer_reviews.title: Instruction does not match safe.
customer_reviews.text: Tried to set combination but will not set. instructions said push and hold green/red button. There are no buttons on this model. tried to contact company but it says voice mail is full. there is not even instruction on where to send it back. No paper work or brand name on the safe.
customer_reviews.author: james lampkin

customer_reviews.title: Great safe for price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this safe to keep curious hands away and works great! No issues out of box was easy set up. The size is perfect for my use and really like the extra lock box with in the safe. The safe is sturdy and no fears of tipping over after wall mounts were installed. The safe is not Fort Knox but your also not paying for that! For the price this is a quality safe and if another one is need this will be my first option!
customer_reviews.author: Albert Cortinas Jr

customer_reviews.title: Cannot put multiple long guns in the cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Door sticks at bottom half which makes it difficult to open. Have to finesse to get open. Am I doing something wrong!?
customer_reviews.author: George White

customer_reviews.title: I thought it was avoid buy until I have this issue.
customer_reviews.text: After anchoring and putting new batteries the safe works fine for 2 days. On the 3rd day the safe constantly makes a beeping sound very 10-15 mins. Replaced again the batteries with an energizer and still makes the annoying sound specially at night. May wife wanted me to remove it and throw it out. I tried to contact the seller and sent messages but to no avail. I just bought this last week and I already dispose the box and don’t want to remove it . If the seller will not call me, then I will call Amazon to seller the score. I already removed the batteries to make peace with my wife....
customer_reviews.author: Fernando D Manaloto

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t like the guns with scopes didn’t fit well but it’s ok I just need something safe to put my guns in If u want easy access for your guns with scopes get a different locker
customer_reviews.author: Pixiegirl

customer_reviews.title: No way to set new passcode
customer_reviews.text: Tried to set combination but will not set. instructions said push and hold green/red button. There are no buttons on this model. tried to contact company but it says voice mail is full. there is not even instruction on where to send it back. No paper work or brand name on the safe.
customer_reviews.author: David Wainwright

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: perfect size safe for a couple of guns and 3-4 rifles, great quality and easy password set up. by far THE MOST SECURE shipped item I have ever received in my life, double cardboard box, metal corner protectors, cardboard corner protectors, 1 inch all around cardboard filler, plastic strapping, bagged, and styrofoamed . INDESTRUCTIBLE !!! GREAT WORK !!! needles to say not a single scratch........
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Rifle Safe Large Electronic 4 Gun Safe, INVIE Quick Access Shotgun Security Storage Cabinet with Movable Shelf for Handgun/Ammo
feature_bullets: 【How Easy to Install】INVIE large gun safe comes already assembled. 10 Pre-punched mounting holes, 6 in the back and 4 at the bottom allow for easy attachment to the floor or wall (or both) with attached bolts. All you need to do is just insert the batteries and set the key pad.

【Re-programmable Digital Access】Our Digital Security Safe equipped with an electronic lock, with easy-to-follow instructions it can be easily programmed. For quick firearm access during emergencies, instantly unlock the safe with a reliable PIN code; Make sure keep emergency keys out of the safe in case the batteries dies.

【Overall Dimensions】Larger and deeper long rifle security cabinet with movable shelf. Exterior Dimensions: 9.8”(W) x 8.7”(D) x 52”(H) ; Top compartment Dimensions: 9.6”(W) x 7.5” (H). The shelf can be removed if you do not want and also can store handgun, ammo and other things in your home or office.

【Higher Level of Security】Our firearm storage cabinet is made of reinforced solid steel wall construction and a corrosion and stain resistant powder coat. With 3 steel active bolts, anti-pry bars, ruggedized exterior hinges and drill resistant hard plate to protect the lock body which helps prevent unauthorized entry or removal of your gun safe.

【100% Satisfaction Guarantee】Upgraded package to avoid damages during shipment. Our professional customer service team will address your any concerns within 24 hours. Don't wait any longer, Join INVIE’s thousands of customer groups, click the "Add to Cart" button now!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars35 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
